mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_table( id, name, pk, comments, table_type, class_name, parent_table, parent_table_fk, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, issync ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pk}, #{comments}, #{tableType}, #{className}, #{parentTable}, #{parentTableFk}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{isSync} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gen_table SET pk= #{pk}, comments = #{comments}, table_type = #{tableType}, class_name = #{className}, parent_table = #{parentTable}, parent_table_fk = #{parentTableFk}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, issync = #{isSync} WHERE id = #{id}
